# isRestrictedToDraggingApplication

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the drag session is confined to the app that started the drag activity.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var isRestrictedToDraggingApplication: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

The value for this property is set by the source app’s drag interaction delegate method [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIDragInteractionDelegate/dragInteraction(_:sessionIsRestrictedToDraggingApplication:)].  If the value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], the drag session is restricted to the app that started the drag operation.

## Checking for drag and drop session restrictions

- **allowsMoveOperation**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the drag session permits moving drag items within the same app.
